abstract: Former Iowa State women's basketball player Nikki Moody sues coach Bill Fennelly, university and state for racial discrimination and retaliation; other college basketball news noted.

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Nikki Moody sued Coach Bill Fennelly, the university and the state for racial discrimination and retaliation, saying she had been repeatedly called a “thug.”
lead_paragraph: Nikki Moody sued Coach Bill Fennelly, the university and the state for racial discrimination and retaliation, saying she had been repeatedly called a “thug.”
